Class ShardManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.discloader.discloader.common.ShardManager

  • public final class ShardManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to handling the shards of a sharded connection to Discord's Gateway Usage: DLOptions options = new DLOptions(); ShardManager manager = new ShardManager(

    0.0.3
    Version:
